title: Navratna Stud Earrings - Sampoorna Swarnam Jhumkis
features: Hexagon shaped stud earring with a ruby center stone surrounded by diamonds and other gemstones that represent the 9 planets of the Hindu solar system. The surrounding gemstones and diamonds are set in an open setting, allowing light to pass through for maximum brilliance. The unique stud design offer a modern geometric twist to the traditional Navratna design, making it versatile for both traditional and modern occasions. High-quality craftsmanship ensures a lasting heirloom.
description: A timeless piece that embodies both tradition and sophistication, with a gemstone of each planet as per the traditional Hindu tradition. The hexagon setting is modern and timeless. High-quality 22K gold and sparkling diamonds showcase the fine craftsmanship and quality of our Hyderabad artisans.
